title: These Limited-Edition Costco Plates Are So Gorgeous, You'll Want 2 Sets
description: They’re perfect for the holidays. READ MORE...
author: Ashia Aubourg

html:

  • Tableware & Decor
  • Product Reviews & Recommendations

Ashia Aubourg

From the moment I started remixing ramen noodles into gourmet meals and spending hours watching cooking shows as a puny six-year-old, I knew I found a deep passion for food. While I realized — after taking on a two-year high school internship in an award-winning kitchen — that a…read more

published now

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

Costco may not be the first place you’d think to look when shopping for holiday decor, but you may want to change your approach because the warehouse store has lots of festive gems. If you forage through the aisles there, you’ll find the most stunning seasonal dinnerware set — it’s so adorable that people are clearing it off the shelves.

If you visit Costco, look for the Denmark Holiday Dinnerware Set. It is available in two festive shades: snowy white and forest green. These stoneware dishes feature adorable Christmas trees painted on them. The entire pack costs $39.99 and includes dinner plates, salad plates, and bowls for four people. 

Shoppers are obsessed with this Costco dinnerware set. One digital creator, @costcofindsca, posted about it, and people raced to the comments to express how “adorable” it is and how they’ve gone to their nearest locations to find it.

While they’re unavailable on Costco’s website, you can try to find a similar version online. Still, the deal at Costco is unbeatable, and with the holiday season here, you’ll want to try to grab this lovely set so you can deck your table out with this stunning dinnerware set.
